member.name: T:WebUI.Filters.ConfirmUserAttribute
member.summary: Confirm user is confirming is user really exists in database and has rights as it is in identity claims. Recommends to user this attribute for actions which can provide some secret data or can change data and actions is accessible only for some user roles.
